content: All relative imports must end with .js extension due to NodeNext module resolution

name: ajv-esm-import
description: Ajv requires special ESM import: import _Ajv from 'ajv'; const Ajv = _Ajv.default ?? _Ajv;
Putting JSON schemas in .json files causes tsc to skip them in dist/ output
resolution: Export schemas from .ts files instead (e.g. src/schemas/record-schema.ts)

description: Ajv strict mode rejects schemas with required/properties without type: 'object' in definitions
resolution: Keep JSON schemas flat and explicit — always include type: 'object' alongside required and properties

content: TypeScript strict mode with zero escape hatches — no ts-ignore, no ts-expect-error, no any types
